option.name: originalContent
option.value:
name: CI - Build, Test & Artefacts
on: push: branches: [master, main] pull_request: branches: [master, main] workflow_dispatch:
jobs: build: runs-on: ubuntu-latest steps: - name: Checkout code uses: actions/checkout@v4
- name: Set up JDK 17 uses: actions/setup-java@v3 with: java-version: '17' distribution: 'temurin'
- name: Lint (Checkstyle) run: | mvn checkstyle:check || true
- name: Build run: | mvn clean install -DskipTests=false
- name: Run tests (unit, integration, E2E) run: | mvn verify
- name: Upload build artefacts uses: actions/upload-artifact@v4 with: name: build-artefacts path: | **/target/*.jar **/target/surefire-reports/ **/target/failsafe-reports/
# - name: Publish test badge # uses: schneegans/test-results-badge-action@v2 # with: # github_token: ${{ secrets.GITHUB_TOKEN }} # workflow_name: CI - Build, Test & Artefacts # test_result_file: '**/target/surefire-reports/*.xml'

option.name: updatedContent
option.value:
name: CI - Build, Test & Artefacts
on: push: branches: [master, main] pull_request: branches: [master, main] workflow_dispatch:
jobs: lint: runs-on: ubuntu-latest steps: - name: Checkout code uses: actions/checkout@v4 - name: Set up JDK 17 uses: actions/setup-java@v3 with: java-version: '17' distribution: 'temurin' - name: Lint (Checkstyle) run: mvn checkstyle:check
build: runs-on: ubuntu-latest needs: lint steps: - name: Checkout code uses: actions/checkout@v4 - name: Set up JDK 17 uses: actions/setup-java@v3 with: java-version: '17' distribution: 'temurin' - name: Build run: mvn clean install -DskipTests=true - name: Upload build artefacts uses: actions/upload-artifact@v4 with: name: build-artefacts path: | **/target/*.jar
tests: runs-on: ubuntu-latest needs: build steps: - name: Checkout code uses: actions/checkout@v4 - name: Set up JDK 17 uses: actions/setup-java@v3 with: java-version: '17' distribution: 'temurin' - name: Run tests (unit, integration, E2E) run: mvn verify - name: Upload test reports uses: actions/upload-artifact@v4 with: name: test-reports path: | **/target/surefire-reports/ **/target/failsafe-reports/

option.name: updatedContent
option.value: ALTER TABLE walletEntity RENAME TO wallet;

option.name: updatedContent
option.value: ALTER TABLE stock_rule ADD COLUMN price DECIMAL(18,2) NOT NULL DEFAULT 0;
